item.title: Get A Quotation
item.author: Administrator
item.description: Khan Engineering is leading Manufacturer of Screen Printing Machinery's in Pakistan. Each and every machine are MADE IN PAKISTAN!!. Get Instant Quotation by Contacting Us!!
item.content:encoded:
Getting a quotation from Khan Engineering is a simple and hassle-free process. Just reach out to us through our contact channels, and our responsive team will guide you through the quotation process. Whether you have a specific list of equipment in mind or need assistance in choosing the right solutions, we're here to help.

Feel Free To Ask a Quotation

Feel free to share your project details, specifications, and any specific requirements you may have. Our team will promptly provide you with a comprehensive quotation, ensuring clarity and transparency in every step of the process.

item.title: Flasher Cure Units
item.author: Administrator
item.content:encoded:
A Round Screen Printing Machine is tailored for cylindrical objects, offering automated precision in applying graphics around their surfaces. With rotational capabilities, it ensures seamless and efficient printing on items like bottles and containers.

Heat Press Printing

Heat presses utilize heat and pressure to transfer designs onto various surfaces, making them essential tools for creating durable and vibrant prints on materials like fabrics, ceramics, and metals. Available in different types, such as clamshell and swing-away models, they offer versatility and efficiency in the printing process.

Uv Curing for Printing

UV curing in screen printing machines employs ultraviolet light to quickly and precisely cure inks, resulting in vibrant and durable prints on various surfaces. This technology ensures fast drying times and enhanced print quality, making it a valuable asset for efficient and high-quality screen printing.

CNC Machine

We Also Manufacture CNC Machines. CNC Machines for Carving Wood like Door, Aluminium, Silver. It can also do engraving with Laser like Cutting Metal, Engraving on Wood or Metal, Sewing Clothes.

Printing Screen Exposing Camera

Exposing Camera are Used To Expose Designs To the Printing Screen by using UV Light Exposure. We can Also Manufacture and Provide you that.
